recipes.name: Spinach and Egg Breakfast Sandwich
recipes.instructions:
1. Toast bread slices
2. Cook eggs with spinach
3. Assemble sandwich with cheese
4. Season with salt and pepper

recipes.name: Simple Chicken Salad
recipes.instructions:
1. Cook chicken breast
2. Chop vegetables
3. Mix all ingredients
4. Dress with olive oil and lemon juice
5. Season with salt and pepper

recipes.name: Milk and Cereal
recipes.instructions: Pour cereal into bowl. Add milk.

recipes.name: French Toast
recipes.instructions:
1. Whisk eggs, milk, cinnamon, and vanilla
2. Dip bread slices in mixture
3. Cook in butter until golden
4. Serve with maple syrup

recipes.name: Chicken and Vegetable Stir Fry
recipes.instructions:
1. Cook rice according to package
2. Slice chicken and vegetables
3. Stir fry chicken until cooked
4. Add vegetables and stir fry
5. Add soy sauce, garlic, and ginger
6. Serve over rice
